Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its unique features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, I am offering this remarkable product to you for $12000. I trust this proposal will be attractive to you given the product's worth to you stands at $8000. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
